entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this afternoon then cloudy. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 late this afternoon. High 6. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning after midnight. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 3.
